co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Interface FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectFrom

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FlowSpecification.Builder.MoreConnect
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowSpecification.Builder.Connector
    Enclosing class:
    FlowSpecification.Builder

    public static interface FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectFrom
    Defines the starting flowlet for a connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo from(Flowlet flowlet)
      Defines the flowlet that is at the beginning of the connection.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo from(Stream stream)
      Defines the stream that the connection is reading from.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo from(String flowlet)
      Defines the flowlet that is at the beginning of the connection by the flowlet name.
      FlowSpecification.Builder.ConnectTo fromStream(String stream)
      Defines the stream that the connection is reading from by the stream name.
